Container.Name: Textarr
Container.Overview: AI-powered media request bot for Sonarr and Radarr. Supports Telegram, Discord, Slack (no port forwarding needed), and SMS via Twilio (requires Tailscale Funnel or Cloudflare Tunnel for webhooks). Configure everything through the web UI.
Container.Description: AI-powered media request bot for Sonarr and Radarr. Request movies and TV shows via natural language on Telegram, Discord, Slack, or SMS. Telegram/Discord/Slack work without exposing ports. SMS (Twilio) requires a public URL - use Tailscale Funnel or Cloudflare Tunnel. All configuration is done through the web UI after installation.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port for the web interface and webhook endpoint

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: Path to store configuration and session data

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID to run as (99 for nobody on Unraid)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID to run as (100 for users on Unraid)

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Logging level: debug, info, warn, error
